Lyrics: Tu as tout seul, Jean, Jean, vignes et prés,
Poetic Translation: You have them all, Jean, Jean, the vines and plains;

Lyrics: Tu as tout seul ton or et ta pécune,
Poetic Translation: You have them all, your gold and all your treasure;

Lyrics: Tu as tout seul des logis diaprés
Direct Translation: See Mick Swithinbank's work at Choral Public Domain Library.
Poetic Translation: You have them all, your buildings and domains:

Lyrics: Où nul vivant n'y prétend chose aucune,
Poetic Translation: No man disputes them; savor them at leisure.

Lyrics: Tu as tout seul ton bonheur et fortune,
Poetic Translation: You have it all, your money, ease and pleasure;

Lyrics: Tu as tout seul ton vivre et ton repas.
Poetic Translation: You have it all, your room and board for life.

Lyrics: Tu as tout seul toutes choses fors une,
Poetic Translation: You have it all: Your worth no man could measure;

Lyrics: C'est que tout seul ta femme tu n'as pas.
Poetic Translation: All things on earth are yours except your wife!
